results.title: Metformin Protects Against Sunitinib-induced Cardiotoxicity: Investigating the Role of AMPK.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_thiazolyl_blue @CHEMICAL_MESH:C022616 @@@3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide@@@ (@CHEMICAL_monooxyethylene_trimethylolpropane_tristearate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C070243 @@@MTT@@@) assay was used to assess adjunctive treatment of and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@hepatoma G2@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Promyelocytic_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015473 @@@promyelocytic leukemia@@@ (@CELLLINE_CVCL:0002 @@@HL-60@@@) cells treated with 0.1-100 microM @CHEMICAL_Sunitinib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077210 @@@sunitinib@@@ +-50 microM @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Kuburas R, Gharanei M, Haussmann I, Maddock H, Sandhu H. Metformin Protects Against Sunitinib-induced Cardiotoxicity: Investigating the Role of AMPK. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2022 Jun 1;79(6):799-807. PMID: 35266920

results.title: [Effect of metformin on acute promyelocytic leukemia cell line NB4 and its mechanism].
results.journal: Zhongguo Shi Yan Xue Ye Xue Za Zhi
results.text_hl: [Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Promyelocytic_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015473 @@@acute promyelocytic leukemia@@@ cell line @CELLLINE_CVCL:0005 @@@NB4@@@ and its mechanism].

results.title: Antileukemic effect of paclitaxel in combination with metformin in HL-60 cell line.
results.text_hl: Consequently, we suggest that the combination of @CHEMICAL_Paclitaxel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017239 @@@paclitaxel@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can be used as an option assessable for development of new treatment strategies for @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Promyelocytic_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015473 @@@APL@@@.

citations.NLM: Asik A, Kayabasi C, Ozmen Yelken B, Yılmaz Susluer S, Dogan Sigva ZO, Balcı Okcanoglu T, Saydam G, Biray Avci C, Gunduz C. Antileukemic effect of paclitaxel in combination with metformin in HL-60 cell line. Gene. 2018 Mar 20;647():213-220. PMID: 29309887

results.title: Metformin induces differentiation in acute promyelocytic leukemia by activating the MEK/ERK signaling pathway.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ induces differentiation in @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Promyelocytic_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015473 @@@acute promyelocytic leukemia@@@ by activating the @GENE_MAP2K7 @GENE_5609 @@@MEK@@@/@GENE_MAPK1 @GENE_5594 @@@ERK@@@ signaling pathway.

citations.NLM: Huai L, Wang C, Zhang C, Li Q, Chen Y, Jia Y, Li Y, Xing H, Tian Z, Rao Q, Wang M, Wang J. Metformin induces differentiation in acute promyelocytic leukemia by activating the MEK/ERK signaling pathway. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2012 Jun 8;422(3):398-404. PMID: 22575507
